\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	& {\vdots } && {\vdots } \\
	{\cdots } & {C^{p,q-1}} && {C^{p-1,q-1}} & {\cdots } \\
	{\cdots } & {C^{p,q}} && {C^{p-1,q}} & {\cdots } \\
	& {\vdots } && {\vdots }
	\arrow["{d_v}"', from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{d_v}"', from=1-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{d_h}"', from=2-2, to=2-1]
	\arrow[""{name=0, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "{d_v}"', from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{d_h}"', from=2-4, to=2-2]
	\arrow[""{name=1, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "{d_v}"', from=2-4, to=3-4]
	\arrow["{d_h}"', from=2-5, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{d_h}"', from=3-2, to=3-1]
	\arrow["{d_v}"', from=3-2, to=4-2]
	\arrow["{d_h}"', from=3-4, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{d_v}"', from=3-4, to=4-4]
	\arrow["{d_h}"', from=3-5, to=3-4]
	\arrow["{\text{anticommute}}"{description}, shift right, draw=none, from=1, to=0]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
